original: 司隸扶風郡人，東漢忠臣。曾同王允誅殺董卓，但董卓死後，王允自專，於是士孫瑞拒絕受功封侯。後獻帝東奔，士孫瑞為保駕，在亂軍中被害。
text: Si Li Fufeng County, a loyal minister in the Eastern Han Dynasty. He once killed Dong Zhuo with Wang Yun, but after Dong Zhuo's death, Wang Yun made his own choice, so Sun Rui refused to receive merits. Later, Emperor Xian ran east, and Shi Sun Rui was escorted by him and was killed in the rebellion.
